name: Luzion Protocol
description: Luzion Protocol is an auto staking, auto rebase, auto liquidity, auto dividend and auto burn function protocol. It's develop to ensure a peace of mind for holders with a secured and transparent protocol. Staking are automated and paid at every 15 minutes or per epoch and dividends are paid at every hour. A simple buy-hold-earn system that grows your LZN portfolio and BUSD rewards in your wallet at a lightning fast pace.
